entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow or ice pellets near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
